# emma_provider (Data Source)

Provider data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "emma_provider" "aws" {
  name = "Amazon EC2"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Provider name

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Provider id
